website_summaries.verdict: A green tea lotion that is specially formulated to help reduce skin redness and itching.
pros: Consists of grapefruit seed and tea tree that help heal wounds and scar tissue and soothe the skin
Green tea lotion absorbs quickly to deliver immediate results
Can be used daily to help you maintain radiant skin both now and in the future
cons: Pricey in comparison to similar green tea lotions
Fails to effectively treat dry skin

customer_reviews.title: Shipping issues
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Acquired a bottle elsewhere and decided to purchase the same thing on Amazon. The product seems to moisturize well and help dry, chapped skin. The negative was in the shipment. The cap on the dispenser was loose and some product leaked. Not enough to return, but packaging could be a lot better. The manufacturer tried to seal the cap and plunger with some type of plastic heat wrap. Doesn’t work. You may receive an intact bottle, or one like I had with some minor spillage or open the box to find the entire contents swimming with the bottle. Who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Ernst Jr

customer_reviews.title: Best hand lotion ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this lotion at the salon I go to for pedicures and fell in love with it. I work for a dermatologist and have tried just about every lotion, cream, ointment and potion for extremely dry hands but this stuff is the best and it never lets me down. It also has the lightest most delicious scent.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe salon quality lotion
customer_reviews.text: My nail salon used this lotion on me after a pedicure. I love the scent so much that I looked it up to buy some for my home. I use it every night before bed. Unlike other lotions, the scent lasts a long time. I only gave 4 stars for value however, because it is very costly.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Best Lotion on Market
customer_reviews.text: Da Bomb as far as lotions are concerned. No greasy, fast absorbing, natural, love the scent, luxurious. 7/2019 Update it appears the manufacturer may not be making this any more YIKES! Amazon’s our so if anyone sees it anywhere besides eBay for the unreal price of $50!!! Talk about price scheming. Help!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t typically like to wear lotion but this lotion is great. It goes on thin and light, doesn’t leave a greasy feeling and the smell is amazing. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Bottle arrived open
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave a 1 star in value for money is because the original order and the replacement order came on bags with the bottle open and lotion squirted inside of the bag. Very disappointed in Amazon’s shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Louks

customer_reviews.title: Product quality not there
customer_reviews.text: Product not the same. Not happy with the product I received. Will not reorder. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Marks

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant lotion
customer_reviews.text: This is great lotion. My manicurist used it on my arms and it felt so good, was not sticky and has a lovely scent.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Love this lotion
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the summer when I don't need such a heavy lotion for my dry skin. The scent is nice and not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Odegard

customer_reviews.title: little expensive
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product, the moisture the smell all of it a little expensive though
customer_reviews.author: mard

customer_reviews.title: Leaked During Transit
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it 4 stars because it opened up during transit and leaked all over the bag. It was a mess, but the lotion itself is nice.
customer_reviews.author: bcharlotte

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used it through my radiation treatments due to breast cancer. My Radiologist Oncologist is surprised at how well my skin is doing. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cap was not sealed...
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box, lotion Was all over, it was not taped down!! It smells great
customer_reviews.author: Vicki M Amussen

customer_reviews.title: You need this lotion.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best body lotion I have used. My skin is so soft! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborrah J Livesay

customer_reviews.title: It's a wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: It is a wonderful product I recommend it to anyone I will be ordering more of it ASAP 👍👍😍😍💞
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product daily. I love the smell & moisturizing effect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lotion!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product ! Just as described and on time !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will love it !!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best hand and body lotions I’ve ever used, love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bea Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Smells very nice, not greasy
customer_reviews.text: Lotion feels good, not greasy, and smells vey nice, but packaging leaves much to be desired. Much of it was in the bag when t arrived. Seller needs to fix this problem.
customer_reviews.author: rn4kids

customer_reviews.title: Nice silky feelinf
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is so smooth and absorbs into your skin well. Leaves a silky feeling when dry. As a bonus, it smells fantastic. So fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Jana R. Poston

customer_reviews.title: Incredible purchased
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion but it's so expensive. Worth every penny and I buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Marsella Guins

customer_reviews.title: Creamy and great scent
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent. It’s light and other people have commented on the scent too
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite body lotion.
customer_reviews.text: Great lotion. Not too heavy, lightly scented and moisturizes well.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Amazing scent
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is awesome- I tried it at my nail salon, found it online and for the money it’s a solid buy. The scent is great and it leaves your hands very soft.
customer_reviews.author: RaeM

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: Hard to run in. Takes a while. Moisture is ok
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Leave My Hands Oily
customer_reviews.text: This is by far some of my favorite lotion. Goes on smooth, dries quickly, but doesn't leave your hands oily. It also works well on my sensitive skin and the fragrance is light and not overpowering at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Nice lotion
customer_reviews.text: Nice light scent and a little goes a long way. A little greasier than I like but it dissipates fast. Leaves my hand feeling hydrated almost all day
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion but leaked out in shipping with no packing in box.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. However, it was shipped in an empty box with the pump in an unlocked position so part of the lotion had leaked out.
customer_reviews.author: Jen M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this lotion.
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion for my feet in the evening before I go to bed. Rich and soothing. Great price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Lotion
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and it's one of his current favorite body lotions.
customer_reviews.author: Jenheeya

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Absorbs well and softens my very dry skin. Smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Really nice lotion but...
customer_reviews.text: So this product is very moisturizing but the top came defective, it still works but it’s still half torn off. Also this lotion is a tiny bit oily btw but i still recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So hydrating
customer_reviews.text: My manicurists uses it on my hand and I love how hydrating it is. So happy I found it on Amazon! Smells great too.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria L Nunez

product_meta.title: Good Seed Citrus & Green Tea Hand & Body Lotion 30oz (New Packaging)
product_meta.description: Good Seed Citrus & Green Tea Hand & Body Lotion 30 oz
feature_bullets: The blend of Grapefruit seed and Tea Tree
Enriched with grapefruit seed extract which promotes the healing of wounds and scar tissue. Also acts as an anti-fungal agent
Tea Tree extract is used as an effective anti viral and antiseptic properties. It soothes the skin and reduces redness and itching
Grape fruit Seed benefit skin's appearance by bonding with collagen, which is the building block of healthy skin, to maintain skin cell health in addition to the skin's elasticity
